data.message: LOVE you so much, dear Facebook!! Happy 11th birthday! You have helped to create more friendships, connections, school reunions, family reunions, adoptees and birthparents reunited, organ donors connected, more transparent and authentic sharing, celebrations, an incredible amount of commerce and sooooo much more!!!! Here's to the next 11 years – it's going to be an awesome journey! 🎉🙏😍✨💕

replies.message: Thank you for your beautiful birthday wishes, Mari. We have had 11 great years thanks to kindness like yours. We truly appreciate you being part of our community. May you have a wonderful #friendsday! -Chantal
